column4: anyone have any suggestions for dualbooting Karmic/Mint7? I've already got karmic installed and a blank partition reserved for mint.  Do I just install it to that partition and uncheck all of the boot manager stuff when setting up manual partitions in the mint install?  Will grub2 detect the newly installed mint?
make sure you share /boot partitions to make it easy
I'm not sure that I have a dedicated /boot parition will that be a problem?
won't cause a problem, just makes it very hard to manage
